descriptions.exceptionallyGifted: Your cognitive abilities are truly exceptional and rare.
descriptions.highlyGifted: You have superior intellectual abilities that place you in the gifted range.
descriptions.aboveAverage: Your cognitive abilities are stronger than most people.
descriptions.average: Your cognitive abilities are right in the typical range.
descriptions.belowAverage: Your cognitive abilities are in the lower range but still within normal variation.
descriptions.lowAverage: This suggests areas where additional support or practice could be beneficial.

population.exceptional: Only 0.1% of people score this high
population.highly: About 2% of people score in this range
population.above: About 16% of people score in this range
population.average: About 68% of people score in this range
population.below: About 16% of people score in this range
population.low: About 2% of people score in this range

iqResults.shareText: Just took an IQ test and scored {score}! That puts me in the {percentile}. What's your cognitive superpower? 🧠

iqQuestions.text: 哪个词不符合：苹果、橙子、香蕉、胡萝卜、葡萄？
这个模式中接下来是什么：○ △ ○ △ △ ○ △ △ △ ?
如果5台机器用5分钟制造5个小部件，那么100台机器制造100个小部件需要多长时间？
缺少的数字是什么：3、7、15、31、?
书之于阅读，正如叉子之于：
哪个形状不同？
如果A比B高，B比C高，那么谁最高？
数列中下一个数字是什么：2、4、8、16、?
如果今天是星期一，那么3天后是星期几？
铅笔之于写字，正如画笔之于：
逻辑顺序是什么：蛋、小鸡、母鸡？
下一个字母是什么：A、C、E、G、?
如果你有5个苹果，拿走2个，你还剩下多少个？
哪个词与其他词最不相关：狗、猫、鱼、鸟？
60分钟等于1小时，那么24小时等于什么？
哪个形状与其他不同？
玛丽有5个苹果。如果她给出3个，她还剩多少个？
数列中下一个数字是什么：10、20、30、?
汽车用汽油驱动，那么钟表用什么驱动？
哪一对与其他最不同？
一打是12个。半打是多少个？
哪个动物与其他不同：蝙蝠、鹰、蝴蝶、企鹅？
雨之于湿润，正如火之于：
逻辑顺序：种子、植物、花
哪个数字在数列中不符合：2、4、6、9、10？
完成类比：白天之于夜晚，正如夏天之于：
5×5＋5等于多少？
哪个字母不同：B、C、D、F、G？

bigFiveQuestions.text: 我倾向于挑别人的毛病
我富有创意，能想出新点子
我很平静，能很好地处理压力
我对艺术体验没有多少兴趣

mbtiQuestions.text: 参加了2小时的社交活动后，你的感觉是？
options: 充满活力和兴奋 - 遇到了很多新朋友
精神疲惫但有成就感 - 准备回家了
制定详细的时间表和检查清单
只定个大方向，边做边调整

mbtiQuestions.text: 做困难决定时，你更重视：
options: 对人的影响和价值观念

mbtiQuestions.text: 学习新概念时，你更喜欢通过：
options: 理论概念和抽象可能性

mbtiQuestions.text: 工作中，你从以下获得能量：

options: 提前预订所有内容，制定详细行程
客观分析问题找解决方案
考虑每个人的感受恢复和谐
直接经验和观察的具体事实
看到模式和联系的直觉
引导对话，与许多人交谈
与少数亲密朋友深入交流
明确的截止日期和既定程序
灵活的时间表和创意自由

mbtiQuestions.text: 收到批评时，你的第一反应是：
options: 这个反馈是基于事实的吗？
这个人对我有什么看法？
使用经过验证的方法和过往经验
探索新视角和创意想法

mbtiQuestions.text: 下班后，你通过以下方式充电：
options: 与同事共进晚餐分享一天的经历
规划每个细节，按步骤进行
设定大致方向，根据需要调整

mbtiQuestions.text: 学习时，你对以下更感兴趣：

eqQuestions.text: 压力大时，你识别自己情绪的能力如何？
愤怒时，你控制情绪的能力如何？
他人悲伤时，你理解其感受的能力如何？
处理冲突寻找解决方案的能力如何？
你对自己情绪影响行为的意识程度如何？
在令人沮丧的情况下保持冷静的能力如何？
朋友快乐时，你分享其喜悦的能力如何？
与新认识的人建立关系的能力如何？
你对自己优缺点评估的准确程度如何？
你抵抗冲动行为的能力如何？
你读懂他人非语言信号（面部表情、身体语言）的能力如何？
团队合作中的协作能力如何？
你识别情绪触发因素的能力如何？
在压力下保持镇定的能力如何？
你换位思考的能力如何？
处理困难对话的技巧如何？

tests.sectionSubtitle: 哪个测试你最感兴趣？所有都是科学的且超好玩！💫
tests.disclaimer: 🎯 重要：仅供娱乐和自我反思
tests.disclaimerText: 这些评估是为了娱乐和自我反思而设计的，不是专业诊断。如果您需要心理健康支持，请咨询执照医疗提供者。

mbti.title: 16种人格类型
mbti.description: 经典人格测试！你是INTJ策略家还是ENFP热情家？马上来看看！💅

bigfive.title: 大五人格测试
bigfive.description: 连心理学家都在用的测试！了解你的5大人格特质！🧠

eq.title: 情商(EQ)
eq.description: 你多了解自己和别人的情绪？测试一下你的情商超能力！💝

ei.title: 情商
ei.description: 你多了解自己和别人的情绪？测试一下你的情商超能力！💝

iq.title: 大脑挑战
iq.description: 有趣的逻辑谜题和脑力游戏！只是玩玩 - 真正的IQ测试要找心理学家。来试试吧！🤓

lovelanguage.title: 爱语测试
lovelanguage.description: 肯定话语、有质量时间还是身体接触？发现你如何最好地给予和接受爱！

careerpath.title: 职业路径发现者
careerpath.description: 发现与你性格匹配的职业！你是领导者、创造者、帮助者、分析师还是企业家？

relationshipstyle.title: 关系风格
relationshipstyle.description: 你如何爱和与他人连接？发现你独特的关系风格以及在爱情中让你发光的特质！

360assessment.title: 360° 关于我的认知
360assessment.description: 从多个角度发现他人如何看待你。从在不同情境下了解你的人那里获得诚实的见解 - 朋友、同事、家人 - 以了解你的影响力和成长领域。

disc.title: DISC人格测试
disc.description: 发现你的沟通风格！你是支配型、影响型、稳定型还是谨慎型？非常适合理解工作和关系动态！💼

questions.text: 在团队会议中，我倾向于：
options: 热情地分享想法并激励他人
认真倾听并支持团队决定
专注于细节并提出澄清问题

questions.text: 面对截止日期时，我更喜欢：
options: 推动快速决策和立即行动
团结团队并保持积极能量
仔细检查确保一切准确
基于关键事实做出快速决定
与他人创造性地头脑风暴
考虑所有受影响的利益相关者
彻底分析所有可用数据
试图找到双赢解决方案
他人的意见和直觉感受
变得更加坚定和要求严格
更加努力地工作以保持稳定
鼓舞人心且具有激励性

questions.text: 给予反馈时，我更倾向于：
options: 直接指出需要改进的地方
寻找积极的方式来激励改进
提供具体建设性的批评

tests.discDesc: 发现你的沟通风格！你是支配型、影响型、稳定型还是谨慎型？非常适合理解工作和关系动态！💼
tests.adhdDesc: 探索你的注意力模式和能量水平。非常适合了解你的生产力风格！
tests.anxietyDesc: 你如何处理压力？学习你的压力模式并发现健康的应对策略。
tests.depressionDesc: 了解你的情感模式和韧性。完美的个人成长和自我认知！
tests.strengthsDesc: 发现你的核心性格优势！从创造力到善良，找到让你闪闪发光的东西。

conflict.title: 冲突风格评估
conflict.description: 你如何处理分歧？发现你是合作者、竞争者、迁就者、回避者还是妥协者！🤝

tests.conflictDesc: How do you handle disagreements? Discover whether you're a collaborator, competitor, accommodator, avoider, or compromiser! 🤝
tests.trendingSubtitle: 大家都在谈论的最热门人格测试！非常适合与朋友和社交媒体分享📱

love.title: 爱的语言测试
love.description: 发现你如何给予和接受爱！你是身体接触、肯定话语还是其他什么？非常适合情侣！💖

tests.loveDesc: Discover how you give and receive love! Are you physical touch, words of affirmation, or something else? Perfect for couples! 💖

pet.title: 哪种宠物适合你的个性？
pet.description: 你是忠诚的狗、独立的猫、顽皮的仓鼠还是其他什么？根据你的个性找到完美的宠物！🐱

tests.petDesc: Are you a loyal dog, independent cat, playful hamster, or something else? Find your perfect pet match based on your personality! 🐱

tests.careerDesc: Discover the career that matches your personality! Are you a leader, creator, helper, analyst, or entrepreneur? 🚀

relationship.title: 你的恋爱风格是什么？
relationship.description: 你如何爱与他人连接？发现你独特的恋爱风格和让你在爱情中闪闪发光的特质！✨

tests.relationshipDesc: How do you love and connect with others? Discover your unique relationship style and what makes you tick in love! ✨

askfriends.title: 看看谁最了解我
askfriends.description: 创建关于你自己的问题，提供你的答案，然后看看谁最了解你！朋友们会尝试匹配你的答案，并根据他们对你的了解程度进行评分。

couples.growthDesc: 根据你们两人的个性类型和结果，发现加强绽带的技巧和策略！

whyChoose.title: 为什么选择 PersonaTests？ ✨
whyChoose.scientificDesc: 我们的测试基于真正的心理学研究，不仅仅是随机问题。我们不在开玩笑！🧠
whyChoose.instantDesc: 立即获取您的个性划分。无需等待，无延迟，只有纯粹的即时满足！⚡
whyChoose.safeDesc: 我们保持您的答案私密。不出售您的数据，不发奇怪邮件。只有您和您的结果！🔒
whyChoose.everywhereDesc: 在您的手机、笔记本电脑、平板电脑上进行测试 - 在您想发现个性的任何地方！📱

hero.title: About PersonaTests ✨
hero.subtitle: Discover the story behind the world's most engaging personality testing platform

mission.title: Our Mission 🎯
mission.paragraph1: At PersonaTests, we believe that understanding your personality is the key to unlocking your potential. Our mission is to make scientifically-backed personality assessments accessible, engaging, and genuinely helpful for people worldwide.
mission.paragraph2: We've taken the complex world of psychological research and transformed it into fun, interactive experiences that provide real insights into who you are, how you think, and what makes you unique.

scientific.title: 🔬 Scientific Foundation
scientific.description: Our tests are built on decades of psychological research, including validated frameworks like the Big Five model, Myers-Briggs Type Indicator principles, and emotional intelligence theories.

modern.title: ⚡ Modern Experience
modern.description: We've reimagined personality testing for the digital age with engaging interfaces, instant results, and social sharing capabilities that make self-discovery fun.

privacy.title: 🔒 Privacy First
privacy.description: Your personality data belongs to you. We never sell your information, and our tests can be taken anonymously with results shared only at your discretion.

global.title: 🌍 Global Accessibility
global.description: Available in 9+ languages with cultural adaptations, our tests work across devices and are designed to be inclusive and accessible to everyone.

tests.title: Our Test Collection 📚
tests.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of personality assessments, each designed to reveal different aspects of your psychological profile:

types.title: 16 Personality Types
types.description: Based on Carl Jung's psychological types and the Myers-Briggs framework

bigfive.title: Big Five Personality
bigfive.description: The gold standard in personality psychology with decades of research validation

emotional.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotional.description: Measure your ability to understand and manage emotions effectively

specialized.title: Specialized Assessments
specialized.description: DISC, conflict styles, strengths assessment, and relationship compatibility

quality.title: Quality & Accuracy 🎯
quality.frameworks: Validated Frameworks: All our tests are based on peer-reviewed psychological research and established personality models
quality.improvement: Continuous Improvement: We regularly update our assessments based on the latest findings in personality psychology
quality.reliability: Statistical Reliability: Our tests undergo rigorous statistical analysis to ensure consistent and meaningful results
quality.cultural: Cultural Adaptation: Questions and interpretations are adapted for different cultural contexts and languages
quality.ethical: Ethical Standards: We follow APA guidelines for psychological testing and maintain strict ethical standards

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Your data security is our top priority

community.title: Join Our Community 🤝
community.question: Ready to Discover Your Personality?
community.description: Join millions of people who have already discovered their unique personality insights with PersonaTests.

footer.copyright: © 2025 PersonaTests. All rights reserved. Made with ✨ for discovering your true personality.

hero.title: Contact Us 💬
hero.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Get support, share feedback, or ask questions.

form.title: 📝 Send Us a Message
form.name: Name *
form.subject: Subject *
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or issue in detail...

contact.responseTime: 💚 We typically respond within 24-48 hours. For urgent issues, please check our FAQ page first!

quickSupport.title: Quick Support
quickSupport.description: Check our FAQ page for immediate answers to common questions

delete.question: How do I delete my account and data?
delete.answer: Email privacy@personatests.com with your account email address. We'll delete all your data within 30 days as required by GDPR and CCPA.

accurate.question: Are your personality tests accurate?
accurate.answer: Our tests are based on established psychological frameworks but are for entertainment and self-reflection only. They're not professional psychological assessments.

employment.question: Can I use test results for employment decisions?
employment.answer: No. Our tests are for entertainment only and should never be used for medical, employment, or legal decisions. Only licensed professionals can provide such assessments.

premium.question: How do premium reports work?
premium.answer: Premium reports ($2.99) provide detailed insights and are delivered via email within 24 hours. All payments are securely processed through Stripe.

infoCollected.title: Information We Collect
infoCollected.description: When you use PersonaTests, we collect:
infoCollected.results: Test results and personality type information
infoCollected.email: Email address if you create an account
infoCollected.usage: Usage data to improve our services

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.saveHistory: Save your test history (if you create an account)
howWeUse.improve: Improve our personality tests and user experience
howWeUse.sendUpdates: Send you test results and updates (with your consent)

googleAdSense.title: Google AdSense
googleAdSense.description: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements on our website. Google and its partners use cookies and other technologies to:
googleAdSense.serveAds: Serve ads based on your visits to this site and other sites on the Internet
googleAdSense.measure: Measure ad effectiveness and provide reporting
googleAdSense.interestBased: Provide interest-based advertising across the web
googleAdSense.preventFraud: Prevent fraudulent activity and improve ad quality
googleAdSense.optOutGoogle: You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ad Settings
googleAdSense.optOutDAA: You can also opt out via the Digital Advertising Alliance
googleAdSense.optOutEU: European users can visit Your Online Choices
googleAdSense.moreInfo: For more information about Google's privacy practices, please visit Google's Privacy Policy.

otherServices.title: Other Third-Party Services
otherServices.description: We also use the following third-party services:
otherServices.analytics: Google Analytics: 用于网站分析和用户行为洞察
otherServices.stripe: Stripe: 用于高级报告的安全支付处理
otherServices.firebase: Firebase: 用于用户认证和安全数据存储
otherServices.emailjs: EmailJS: 用于通过电子邮件发送高级报告

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no internet transmission is completely secure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: 如果您对此隐私政策有任何疑问，请通过以下方式联系我们：privacy@personatests.com

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using PersonaTests, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you don't agree, please don't use our service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.description: PersonaTests provides personality tests and assessments for entertainment and self-discovery purposes. Our tests are not professional psychological evaluations.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.accurate: Provide accurate information when taking tests
responsibilities.lawful: Use our service for lawful purposes only
responsibilities.respect: Respect the intellectual property rights of PersonaTests
responsibilities.noReverse: Not attempt to reverse engineer or copy our tests

disclaimer.title: Important Medical & Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.warning: ⚠️ Entertainment Only - Not Medical or Professional Services
disclaimer.intro: ALL TESTS ARE FOR ENTERTAINMENT AND SELF-REFLECTION PURPOSES ONLY. Our assessments are NOT:
disclaimer.notSubstitute: Substitute for licensed mental health care
disclaimer.notEmployment: Appropriate for employment or legal decisions
disclaimer.mentalHealth: Mental Health Disclaimer: Tests related to mental health topics (anxiety, depression, ADHD-like symptoms) are purely for fun and cannot diagnose any condition. Only licensed healthcare professionals can provide mental health diagnoses.
disclaimer.iq: IQ Disclaimer: Our "Brain Teaser Challenge" is not a real IQ test. Authentic IQ testing requires professional administration by qualified psychologists using standardized instruments.
disclaimer.help: If you need professional help, please contact: Licensed therapists or your healthcare provider.
disclaimer.acknowledgment: By using this website, you acknowledge that you understand these tests are for entertainment only and will not use results for medical, professional, or legal purposes.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: All content on PersonaTests, including tests, questions, and results, is owned by PersonaTests and protected by copyright laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: PersonaTests is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any damages resulting from your use of our service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of our service constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Questions about these terms? Contact us at: support@personatests.com

360assessment.heroSubtitle: Discover how others perceive you from multiple angles. Get honest insights from people who know you in different contexts - friends, colleagues, family - to understand your impact and areas for growth.

personalInfo.title: Let's start with the basics about you! 😊
personalInfo.purposePlaceholder: Just curious about myself, want to improve at work, working on personal growth, etc.

feedbackAreas.whatFeedbackTitle: What do you want feedback about? Pick your favorites! ✨

leadership.title: How I Lead & Take Charge
leadership.desc: Do I inspire people? Am I good at making decisions? Do I motivate others?

communication.title: How I Talk & Listen
communication.desc: Am I a good listener? Do I explain things clearly? How's my texting game?

teamwork.title: How I Work With Others
teamwork.desc: Am I easy to work with? Do I help teammates? How do I handle drama?

emotional-intelligence.title: My Emotional Side
emotional-intelligence.desc: Do I read people well? Am I aware of my feelings? How empathetic am I?

problem-solving.title: How I Handle Problems
problem-solving.desc: Am I creative with solutions? Do I think things through? Can I figure stuff out?

adaptability.title: How I Handle Change
adaptability.desc: Do I roll with the punches? Am I flexible? How do I deal when things get crazy?

interpersonal.title: How I Connect With People
interpersonal.desc: Do people trust me? Am I good at making friends? Do I build solid relationships?

work-style.title: How I Get Things Done
work-style.desc: Am I organized? Do I meet deadlines? Can people count on me to deliver?

reviewers.whoKnowsYou: Who knows you well enough to give honest feedback? 😊
